1.0.name: wordpress/get-excerpt-with-thumbnail-images
1.0.description:
Inspite of having found numerous plugins to get excerpts along with thumbnail images in Wordpress plugin directory. I have written this plugin to reduce number of requests that are made to MySQL database while fetching data.

Get Excerpts with Thumbnail plugin uses meta data of post, to retrieve thumbnail image. It also uses another plug-in named Cotent Extract by Rob Shumann, to retrieve excerpt from POST. You need install Content Extract plugin before start working with this plugin.

Full documentation of how to this plugin will be available at Get Excerpt with Thumbnail page.
